title: Single-Page Story Generator
description: A web app that generates a story based on user prompts

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Allow users to input prompt and generate story

pages.name: Prompt Form
pages.purpose: Collect user's prompt for generating the story

pages.name: Story Preview
pages.purpose: Display generated story in a preview format

interactions: User enters prompt and clicks 'Generate Story' button
System generates story based on user's input and updates UI
acceptance_criteria: System displays error message when user enters invalid input
Generated story is displayed in preview format
User can click 'Generate Story' button to get new story
